about_the_game:
※Valid only for Romance of the Three Kingdoms w/PUK.

10 officer graphics from the "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi" and an original event "The Three Visits, A Different Take" will be added.


▼Added Officer Graphics
Cao Cao/Xiahou Dun/Zhen Shi/Liu Bei/Zhao Yun/Guan Yinping/Sun Quan/Zhou Yu/Sun Shangxiang/Yuan Shao

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select one of the applicable officers listed above. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the appropriate graphic from the Special tab. Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.

▼To Use(EDIT EVENTS)
In "EDIT EVENTS" select "Create Event/Change Event" and proceed to "Copy Sample Event" to choose one of the scenarios listed above.
After this you will be able to use "Restrict Event" to apply it to the main game, or use "Change Event" to edit the details.
